name: Brigsby Bear
description: After being freed from his life in an underground bunker, a man sets out to make a movie of the only TV show he has ever known.

review.author: UniqueParticle
review.heading: Wonderful sweetness - reminiscent of childhood shows
review.reviewBody: Starts off a bit weird/sad then gets to be one of the most joyful and inspirational pieces of art in film. A very well written and adorable story, even written by the main actor (Kyle Mooney) James Pope, about how he's basically obsessed with Brigsby Bear and wants to make a movie about it, which is lovely. Purely delightful cult almost family flick! Also this is my 240th review which is awesome!
